trans-unit.target: 打开 Azure SQL 迁移笔记本
Azure SQL 目标详细信息

trans-unit.source: This is a blocking issue that will prevent the database migration from succeeding.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个阻止性问题，将阻止数据库迁移成功。

trans-unit.source:
We are assessing the databases in your SQL server instance {0} to identify the right Azure SQL target.
This may take some time.
trans-unit.target:
我们正在评估 SQL Server 实例 {0} 中的数据库，以标识正确的 Azure SQL 目标。
这可能需要一些时间才能完成。

trans-unit.source: We need to collect some information about how your data is configured currently. This may take some time.
trans-unit.target:
我们需要收集有关当前数据配置方式的一些信息。
这可能需要一些时间。

trans-unit.source: There was an error when gathering information about your data configuration. {0}
trans-unit.target: 收集有关数据配置的信息时出错。{0}

trans-unit.source: Based on the assessment results, all {0} of your database(s) in online state can be migrated to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 根据评估结果，你的所有联机状态下的 {0} 个数据库都可以迁移到 Azure SQL。

trans-unit.source: Based on the results of our source configuration scans, {0} out of {1} of your databases can be migrated to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 根据源配置扫描结果，你的 {1} 个数据库中有 {0} 个可以迁移到 Azure SQL。
选择 Azure SQL 目标

trans-unit.source: Based on the results of our source configuration scans, none of your databases can be migrated to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 根据源配置扫描结果，你的任何数据库都不可以可以迁移到 Azure SQL。

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine (IaaS)
trans-unit.target: Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server (laaS)

trans-unit.source: Select your target Azure subscription and your target Azure SQL Managed Instance
trans-unit.target: 选择目标 Azure 订阅和目标 Azure SQL 托管实例

trans-unit.source: Select your target Azure Subscription and your target SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine for your target.
trans-unit.target: 为目标在 Azure 虚拟机上选择目标 Azure 订阅和目标 SQL Server。

trans-unit.source: View assessment results and select one or more database(s) to migrate to Azure SQL Managed Instance (PaaS)
trans-unit.target: 查看评估结果，并选择一个或多个数据库，以迁移到 Azure SQL 托管实例(PaaS)

trans-unit.source: View assessment results and select one or more database(s) to migrate to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine (IaaS)
trans-unit.target: 查看评估结果并选择一个或多个数据库，以迁移到 Azure 虚拟机(IaaS)上的 SQL Server
已选择 {0} 个数据库(共 {1} 个)。

trans-unit.source: Please select a target to continue

trans-unit.target: 请选择要迁移的数据库

trans-unit.source: We have completed the assessment of your SQL Server Instance '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 我们已完成对 SQL Server 实例“{0}”的评估。

trans-unit.source: {0} out of {1} databases can be migrated
trans-unit.target: 可以迁移 {1} 个数据库中的 {0} 个

trans-unit.source: Databases that are not ready for migration to Azure SQL Managed Instance can be migrated to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: 尚未准备好迁移到 Azure SQL 托管实例的数据库可以迁移到 Azure 虚拟机上的SQL Server。

trans-unit.source: Select an Azure account linked to Azure Data Studio or link one now.
trans-unit.target: 选择链接到 Azure Data Studio 的 Azure 账户或立即链接一个账户。

trans-unit.source: There is no linked account. Please add an account.
trans-unit.target: 没有链接的帐户。请添加一个帐户。

trans-unit.target: 所选帐户“{0}”的访问令牌不再有效。请单击“链接账户”按钮，并刷新帐户或选择其他帐户。

trans-unit.target: 访问所选帐户 "{0}" 时出错。请单击“链接帐户”按钮并刷新帐户或选择其他帐户。错误 "{1}"

trans-unit.source: Select the location of your database backups to use for migration.
trans-unit.target: 选择要用于迁移的数据库备份的位置。

trans-unit.source: My database backups are on a network share
trans-unit.target: 我的数据库备份位于网络共享上

trans-unit.source: My database backups are in an Azure Storage Blob Container
trans-unit.target: 我的数据库备份位于 Azure 存储 Blob 容器中

trans-unit.source: My database backups are in an Azure Storage File Share (Coming soon)
trans-unit.target: 我的数据库备份位于 Azure 存储文件共享中(即将推出)

trans-unit.source: Provide the network share location that contains backups and the user credentials that has read access to the share
trans-unit.target: 提供包含备份的网络共享位置以及对共享具有读取访问权限的用户凭据

trans-unit.source: Network share location that contains backups.
trans-unit.target: 包含备份的网络共享位置。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the service account running the source SQL Server instance has read privileges on the network share.
trans-unit.target: 请确保运行源 SQL Server 实例的服务帐户对网络共享拥有读取权限。

trans-unit.source: Windows user account with read access to the network share location.
trans-unit.target: 具有对网络共享位置读取权限的 Windows 用户账户。

trans-unit.source: Provide the Azure storage account where backups will be uploaded to.
trans-unit.target: 提供备份将上传到其中的 Azure 存储帐户。

trans-unit.source: Select the subscription that contains the storage account.
trans-unit.target: 选择包含存储帐户的订阅。

trans-unit.source: Select the storage account where backup files will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 选择要在其中复制备份文件的存储帐户。

trans-unit.source: Select a unique name for this target database
trans-unit.target: 为此目标数据库选择唯一名称

trans-unit.source: Database '{0}' already exists on target Managed Instance '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: 目标托管实例 "{0}" 上已存在数据库 "{1}"。

trans-unit.target: 选择包含存储帐户的订阅。

trans-unit.target: 选择包含备份文件的存储帐户。

trans-unit.target: 选择包含备份文件的容器。

trans-unit.source: Select the subscription that contains the file share.
trans-unit.target: 选择包含文件共享的订阅。

trans-unit.source: Select the storage account that contains the file share.
trans-unit.target: 选择包含文件共享的存储帐户。

trans-unit.source: Select the file share that contains the backup files.
trans-unit.target: 选择包含备份文件的文件共享。

trans-unit.source: Choose from the following migration modes to migrate to your Azure SQL target based on your downtime requirements.
trans-unit.target: 从以下迁移模式中进行选择，以根据停机时间要求迁移到 Azure SQL 目标。

trans-unit.source: Application downtime is limited to cut over at the end of migration.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序停机时间限制为在迁移结束时直接转换。

trans-unit.source: Application downtime will start when the migration starts.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序停机时间将在迁移启动时开始。

Select a storage account value first.
Select a blob container value first.
trans-unit.target: 首先选择一个 Blob 容器值。

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service (DMS) orchestrates database migration activities and tracks their progress. You can select an existing DMS for Azure SQL target if you have created one previously or create a new one below.
trans-unit.target: Azure 数据库迁移服务(DMS)协调数据库迁移活动并跟踪其进度。如果之前创建了一个 DMS，则可以选择现有 DMS 用于 Azure SQL 目标，或在下面创建一个新的 DMS。

trans-unit.source: Note: DMS will run in your Azure subscription in the chosen resource group and does not incur any cost for running it.
trans-unit.target: 注意: DMS 将在所选资源组中的 Azure 订阅中运行，并且不会产生任何运行费用。
选择 Azure 数据库迁移服务

trans-unit.source: Setup with defaults: Add DMS with one click express setup using default options.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认安装: 使用默认选项通过单击快速安装来添加 DMS。

trans-unit.source: Custom setup: Add DMS after customizing most options.
trans-unit.target: 自定义设置: 自定义大多数选项后添加 DMS。

trans-unit.source: No DMS found. Please create a new one
trans-unit.target: 未找到 DMS。请新建一个

trans-unit.source: Please select a DMS that is connected to a node
trans-unit.target: 请选择已连接到节点的 DMS
Azure 数据库迁移服务“{0}”详细信息:

trans-unit.source: Please note that any existing Azure Database Migration Service (DMS) in Azure portal will not show up in Azure Data Studio. DMS created in Azure Data Studio will not be visible in Azure portal yet.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Azure 门户中的任何现有 Azure 数据库迁移服务(DMS)都不会显示在 Azure Data Studio 中。在 Azure Data Studio 中创建的 DMS 在 Azure 门户 中将仍不可见。
数据库迁移服务身份验证密钥
创建 Azure 数据库迁移服务

trans-unit.source: Enter the information below to add a new Azure Database Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: 在下面输入信息以添加新的 Azure 数据库迁移服务。

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service leverages Azure Data Factory's Self-hosted Integration Runtime to upload backups from on-premise network fie share to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Azure 数据库迁移服务利用 Azure 数据工厂的自承载 Integration Runtime 将备份从本地网络文件共享上传到 Azure。

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions below to setup self-hosted Integration Runtime.
trans-unit.target: 按照下面的说明安装自承载集成运行时。
下载并安装集成运行时

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Use this key to register your integration runtime
trans-unit.target: 第 2 步:使用此密钥注册集成运行时

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Click on 'Test connection' button to check the connection between Azure Database Migration Service and Integration Runtime
trans-unit.target: 步骤 3: 单击“测试连接”按钮，以检查 Azure 数据库迁移服务与集成运行时之间的连接

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service is not registered. Azure Database Migration Service '{0}' needs to be registered with self-hosted Integration Runtime on any node.
trans-unit.target: 未注册 Azure 数据库迁移服务。Azure 数据库迁移服务“{0}”需要向任意节点上的自承载集成运行时进行注册。

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service '{0}' is connected to self-hosted Integration Runtime running on the node - {1}
trans-unit.target: Azure 数据库迁移服务“{0}”已连接到在节点上运行的自承载集成运行时 - {1}

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while refreshing the migration service creation status.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while refreshing the migration service creation status.

trans-unit.source: A resource group is a container that holds related resources for an Azure solution
trans-unit.target: 资源组是保管 Azure 解决方案的相关资源的容器。

trans-unit.source: Database migration service has been created successfully
trans-unit.target: 已成功创建数据库迁移服务

trans-unit.source: Database migration service has failed to provision. Please try again after some time.
trans-unit.target: 未能预配数据库迁移服务。请稍后重试。

trans-unit.source: Learn more about things you need before starting a migration.
trans-unit.target: 在开始迁移之前，请了解有关所需内容的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: This feature is not available yet.
SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server

trans-unit.target: 要上传备份的 Azure 存储帐户
自承载集成运行时节点

trans-unit.source: Select the operation you'd like to perform

trans-unit.target: 打开迁移笔记本时出错

trans-unit.source: Determine the migration readiness of your SQL Server instances, identify a recommended Azure SQL target, and complete the migration of your SQL Server instance to Azure SQL Managed Instance or SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: 确定 SQL Server 实例的迁移准备情况，确定建议的 Azure SQL 目标，并完成 SQL Server 实例到 Azure 虚拟机上的 Azure SQL 托管实例或 SQL Server 的迁移。

trans-unit.source: Migrate SQL Server instance to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 将 SQL Server 实例迁移到 Azure SQL。

trans-unit.source: Migrate SQL Server to SQL Managed Instance
trans-unit.target: 将 SQL Server 迁移到 SQL 托管实例

trans-unit.source: Migrate SQL Server to SQL Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: 将 SQL Server 迁移到 SQL 虚拟机

trans-unit.source: Assessment rules for Azure SQL Managed Instance
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL 托管实例的评估规则

trans-unit.source: See the list of rules used to assess the feasibility of migrating your SQL Server to Azure SQL Managed Instance.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅用于评估将 SQL Server 迁移到 Azure SQL 托管实例的可行性的规则列表。

trans-unit.source: Things you need before starting migration:
trans-unit.target: 开始迁移之前需要执行的操作:

trans-unit.source: Azure SQL Managed Instance or SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL 托管实例或 Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server
已成功迁移到 Azure SQL

trans-unit.source: Choose to migrate to Azure SQL
Last applied backup files taken on
trans-unit.target: 上次应用备份文件的时间

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while refreshing the migration status.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while refreshing the migration status.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while canceling the migration.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while canceling the migration.

trans-unit.source: Cannot start the cutover process until all the migrations are done. Click refresh to fetch the latest file status
trans-unit.target: 在完成所有迁移之前，无法启动直接转换过程。请单击“刷新”以提取最新的文件状态
Azure SQL 数据库托管实例
Azure SQL 数据库虚拟机

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to cancel this migration?
trans-unit.target: 是否确实要取消此迁移?

trans-unit.source: Completing cutover without restoring all the backup(s) may result in loss of data.
trans-unit.target: 在不还原所有备份的情况下完成直接转换可能导致数据丢失。

trans-unit.source: Managed Instance migration cutover for Business Critical service tier can take significantly longer than General Purpose as three secondary replicas have to be seeded for Always On High Availability group. This operation duration depends on the size of data. Seeding speed in 90% of cases is 220 GB/hour or higher.
trans-unit.target: 业务关键服务层级的托管实例迁移直接转换需要的时间可能远多于常规用途，因为必须为始终打开高可用性组设置三个次要副本的种子。此操作持续时间取决于数据的大小。在 90% 的情况下，设置种子的速度为 220 GB/小时或更高。

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps before you complete cutover.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps before you complete cutover.

trans-unit.source: 1. Stop all the incoming transactions coming to the source database.
trans-unit.target: 1. 停止传入源数据库的所有传入事务。

trans-unit.source: 2. Take final transaction log backup and provide it in the network share location.
trans-unit.target: 2. 进行最终事务日志备份，并在网络共享位置提供它。

trans-unit.source: 2. Take final differential or transaction log backup and provide it in the Azure Storage Blob Container.
trans-unit.target: 2. Take final differential or transaction log backup and provide it in the Azure Storage Blob Container.

trans-unit.source: 3. Make sure all the log backups are restored on target database. The "Log backups(s) pending restore" should be zero.
trans-unit.target: 3. 确保在目标数据库上还原所有日志备份。“日志备份挂起还原”应为零。

trans-unit.source: 3. Make sure all the log backups are restored on target database. The "Log backups(s) pending restore" should be zero.
trans-unit.target: 3. Make sure all the log backups are restored on target database. The "Log backups(s) pending restore" should be zero.

trans-unit.source: I confirm there are no additional log backup(s) to provide and want to complete cutover.
trans-unit.target: 我确认没有要提供的其他日志备份，并且希望完成直接转换。
正在对数据库“{0}”进行直接转换

trans-unit.source: Migration is not in progress and cannot be cancelled.
Migration is not in progress and cannot be cutover.
trans-unit.target: 迁移未进行，无法直接转换。

trans-unit.source: No pending backups. Click refresh to check current status.
trans-unit.target: No pending backups. Click refresh to check current status.
自承载集成运行时节点

trans-unit.source: Authentication keys used to connect to the Self-hosted Integration Runtime node
trans-unit.target: 用于连接到自承载集成运行时节点的身份验证密钥

trans-unit.source: Enter the credential for source SQL Server instance. This credential will be used while migrating database(s) to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 输入源 SQL Server 实例的凭据。将数据库迁移到 Azure SQL 时将使用此凭据。

trans-unit.source: Select database(s) that you want to migrate to Azure SQL
trans-unit.target: 选择要迁移到 Azure SQL 的数据库

trans-unit.source: Click on SQL Server Instance or any of the databases on the left to view its details.
trans-unit.target: 单击 SQL Server 实例或左侧的任意数据库以查看其详细信息。

trans-unit.source: No issues found for migrating to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: 在 Azure 虚拟机上未发现迁移到 SQL Server 的问题

trans-unit.source: No issues found for migrating to SQL Server on Azure SQL Managed Instance
trans-unit.target: 在 Azure SQL 托管实例上未发现迁移到 SQL Server 的问题
正在开始将数据库 {0} 迁移到 {1} - {2}

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while starting the migration: '{0}'
